name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a results-driven Senior iOS Engineer with 8 years of experience, I specialize in developing high-quality, maintainable, and scalable iOS applications using the **MVVM** and **VIPER** architecture patterns. My technical expertise includes proficiency in **RESTful** and **SOAP** web services, with experience in handling data formats such as **JSON** and **XML**. I utilize **xCode** for building intuitive user interfaces and integrate secure authentication methods using **JWT** for enhanced application security.
In addition to my strong technical capabilities, I excel in communication and problem-solving, enabling effective collaboration with cross-functional teams. I possess a robust understanding of Object-Oriented Analysis (OOA) and Object-Oriented Programming (OOP), allowing me to create clean and efficient code. I have a proven track record in enabling team success through proactive engagement and a commitment to continuous learning and development.
